name: Morph-o-logy
description:
Made in the context of DISCORD JAM#5

You're not your typical, run of the mill cell. No, you're very special. In fact you're exactly like every other cell, but all at once. And for that, everyone want's to kill you.

Plough through your ex-coworkers, neighbors, friends and familly members with your newfound powers and search for the next step in you evolution.

If you plug-in your earphones, you can also enjoy an immersive soundtrack of deep space, on par with 4min.33, by the famous John Cage.

---[  C  R  E  D  I  T  S  ]---

The color palette
99% taken for lospec.com (I take full credit for the immaculate #ffffff white). 
CREATED BY: PINEAPPLEONPIZZA

SH Pinscher font
Acquired from www.fontsquirrel.com
(Also thanks to Discord user Gelgavish#3996 for sharing the website for the Jam!)

This gracious Hex-to-RGB converter
Because Game Maker 1.4 claims to support hex colors, but repeatedly insisted otherwise on my end.

DISCORD JAM 5
For obvious reasons.
